White Brick and Black Mourning Dress

白(しろ)い(い)レンガ(レンガ)と(と)黒(くろ)い(い)喪(も)服(ふく)shiroi RENGA to kuroi mofuku

"From that day on, everything changed."
RL

The story of a young girl becoming fascinated with a boy in a mirror.
